title: Petition to replace self-upvote with self-downvote
body:
If my post's votes are at -4, it doesn't mean I've received 4 downvotes. It means I've received 5. But if I've received 4 downvotes, it shows -3. I could easily rectify this by reversing my own auto-self-upvote. ONLY PERFECTION IS ACCEPTABLE.

FIX THIS RIOT!!!

http://i.imgur.com/jexuRsf.jpg

replies.body: Dude, that's not even a number. That's the word "number". HOW CAN YOU VOTE FOR AN OPTION THAT'S NOT EVEN A REAL NUMBER!
Fair warning, your 4th option has hit 3 votes with mine. Your chance at perfection is rapidly coming to an end if you hurry!
And now it's at 5. These savages...
